name: ExlService Holdings
overview: EXL (NASDAQ: EXLS) is a leading provider of Transformation and Outsourcing services to Global 1000 companies in multiple industries including insurance, banking, financial services, utilities, transportation and travel. Their solutions integrate their knowledge and experience in Decision Analytics, Financial & Risk Management, Operational & Process Excellence, Re-engineering and Integrated Transaction Processing to provide their clients with immediate business impact and long term financial value. They customize their solutions to improve the economics of business performance, transform organizations to be leaner and more flexible and provide a competitive edge in the marketplace. EXL leverages its highly qualified and experienced professionals at its offshore, near-shore and onshore to address their clientsâ€™ present challenges and prepare them to Go Next. Now. to effectively address future challenges.

acquisitions.source_description: ExlService Holdings Buys PDMA Inc For $14.1M
